code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Categ=()=>{const data=[{cateImg:"./img/logopizza.jpg",cateName:"Pizza"},{cateImg:"./img/burgerlogo.jpg",cateName:"Hamburger King"}];const SunnyData=[{cateImg:"./img/banhkem.jpg",cateName:"Bánh kem cute"},{cateImg:"./img/suplogo.jpg",cateName:"Soup"}];const[Active,setActive]=useState(true);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cate products",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cateHeading flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{onClick:()=>{if(Active){setActive(false);}else{setActive(true);}},children:[Active?"Món chính (pizza)":"Món phụ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sunnymargin",children:"|"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"change",children:Active?"Món phụ":"Món chính (pizza)"})]})}),Active?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:data.map((value,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"imgDiv",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:value.cateImg,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:value.cateName})]});})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:SunnyData.map((value,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box sunny flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"imgDiv",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:value.cateImg,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:value.cateName})]});})})]});};export default Categ;
